verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Alleluya, alleluia amina,
alleluia alleluia amina
alleluya,
alleluia amina, alleluya
mshukuruni Bwana kwa kuwa,
fadhili zake ni za milele,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Mshukuruni,
mshukuruni Bwana;
mshukuruni mshukuruni Bwana
alleluya, alleluia amina,
alleluia alleluia amina
alleluya,
alleluia amina, alleluia.
